Articles.Content: I think it would be nice if we had the option for using multiple monitors in KSP2. Like one for flight view and one for map view
That would indeed be very helpful. And cool!

Gimme dis! I have a MIGHTY Need!

Another thing that would be nice would be if there is some way to move  standard in-game and mod dialog boxes to another screen to reduce clutter.

Another idea that might be suited to being a mod.  You'd have to tap into using borderless windowing of the game, and then extend the monitor to display the map view separately.  Two big issues I can think of here.

1.  The window has to be accounted for so as to not open multiple map views.

2.  The window has to be dynamic in that the active vessel is always updated.  This works both ways with the flight view window in that changing the active vessel in map view has to update flight view.
